20110125010016.000|20110125010018.000|CC1|CHILD FREE.

20110125010019.000|20110125010020.000|CC1|THAT THE CHILD WAS TRAPPED

20110125010023.000|20110125010023.000|CC1|CRITICAL CONDITION.

20110125010026.000|20110125010027.000|CC1|19-YEAR-OLD ACCORDING TO POLICE.

20110125010029.000|20110125010032.000|CC1|HOSPITAL WITH TRAUMATIC
